text: Bruno Tonioli (Italian pronunciation: [ˈbruno tonˈjɔli]; born 25 November 1955) is an Italian choreographer, ballroom and Latin dancer, and television personality. ==Works== He has appeared as a judge on the BBC One celebrity dancing show Strictly Come Dancing from 2004 to 2020. He also currently appears as a judge on the ABC TV version of Strictly Come Dancing, Dancing with the Stars in the United States of America. Tonioli co-created and appeared on the BBC One talent show DanceX and its American version, Dance War: Bruno vs. Carrie Ann. In January 2023 he became a judge on Britain's Got Talent. Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Italian choreographers
title: Bruno Tonioli
